scripts.test_demo_chromium_headed: cross-env ENV_NAME=demo SECRET_KEY=batman npx playwright test --project=chromium --headed
scripts.test_demo_firefox_headed: cross-env ENV_NAME=demo SECRET_KEY=batman npx playwright test --project=firefox --headed
scripts.test_demo_chromium_headless: cross-env ENV_NAME=demo SECRET_KEY=batman npx playwright test --project=chromium
scripts.test_demo_firefox_headless: cross-env ENV_NAME=demo SECRET_KEY=batman npx playwright test --project=firefox
scripts.test_demo_ui: cross-env ENV_NAME=demo SECRET_KEY=batman npx playwright test --ui
scripts.test_uat_cr_hd: cross-env ENV_NAME=demo SECRET_KEY=batman npx playwright test --project=chromium --grep=@UAT
scripts.test_demo_cr_hd_vi: cross-env ENV_NAME=demo SECRET_KEY=batman npx playwright test --project=chromium --grep=@VISUAL
scripts.test_demo_cr_hd_lastfailed: cross-env ENV_NAME=demo SECRET_KEY=batman npx playwright test --project=chromium --last-failed
